message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item carries a significant value of $12000 to me due to its unique features and the time, effort, and resources invested in its creation. I am extending this opportunity to you with the hope that it will resonate with your needs and expectations. Considering its quality and rarity, I kindly propose a purchase price of $10000. Should you find this offer appealing, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction. Thank you for considering our product.
